title: Voice-Activated Medication and Appointment Reminders
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want the ALFRED system to provide voice-activated reminders for medications and appointments so that I can efficiently manage care tasks without overwhelming my clients or causing them unnecessary stress.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Alerts
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive real-time alerts for any abnormal health metrics so that I can verify the information and take appropriate action without causing unnecessary stress to my clients.

title: One-Touch Video Calling Feature
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a one-touch video calling feature so that I can easily communicate with clients and their families without complicated setup, ensuring clarity and responsiveness in care coordination.

title: User-Friendly Interface Customization – Simplified Navigation for Quick Access
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a simplified client management dashboard that allows me to quickly access critical health monitoring results and communication tools, so that I can efficiently manage care tasks without unnecessary complexity.

title: Integrated Feedback Mechanism – Real-Time Suggestions for Caregiver Efficiency
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want the ALFRED system to provide real-time suggestions and insights based on the health data of my clients, so that I can make informed decisions and coordinate care effectively without overwhelming my clients with unnecessary alerts.

title: Multimodal Interaction for Client Management
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to use a combination of voice, touch, and gesture recognition to manage multiple clients' health information easily so that I can ensure accurate monitoring and communication without overwhelming my clients or compromising their privacy.

title: Context-Aware Assistance – Time-Sensitive Alerts Based on User Routines
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want ALFRED to provide context-aware time-sensitive alerts based on my clients' routines so that I can effectively monitor their health without causing unnecessary stress or confusion.
